data:

Text-to-Visualization (Text2Vis) generates data visualizations directly from natural 
language queries, democratizing access to data insights. Early Text2Vis efforts, 
primarily relying on rule-based systems and machine learning models, struggled to

allows for better generalization in generating visualization code. However, LLM-
based approaches have mainly focused on textual or code-level optimizations

certain cores offering extension ISAs (eg, vector extension) to accelerate

has gained extensive attention in both industry and academia. Binary translation via
